text: Ani allahaci upasana kara. Tyacyasaha dusarya konala sahabhagi karu naka ani a'i-bapa, nateva'ika, anatha, gariba dubale, javalace sejari, durace sejari ani sobata asalelya pravasansii bhalepanace, upakarace vartana kara, taseca pravasi ani tumacya tabyata aselalyansihi. Nihsansaya allaha aita dakhavinarya ghamendisi prema rakhata nahi
